knimeNode.name: Decryption
knimeNode.shortDescription: Decrypts selected columns from input data set. ImpressiveCode Depress

fullDescription.intro:
Selected columns from input data set, which are plain text (string cell type), will be decrypted. Within the dialog, columns can be moved between the Include and Exclude list. The secret key should be configured in Preferences->Knime->Master Key .
Please check workflow examples here.

fullDescription.option: Columns, which will be not transformed.

ports.outPort: Input data with transformed string values.
